name: Slime Time (oryzajustink)
description:
**NOTICE** Exit buttons were not meant to be included in WebGL version (it will freeze the game please avoid using the exit buttons in game!)

Slime Time is our video game made for LoJam 2019. The theme was mental health, so we decided to make a relaxing, fun, and intuitive game designed to reduce stress. Take care of your slime friends, or they will disappear.

Spacebar - Feed/Pet/Clean/Pick-up/Drop

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move
